text: Issey pehle humne Moosa ko kitaab di thi aur uske maamle mein bhi yahi ikhtilaf hua tha. Agar tere Rubb ne pehle hi ek baat tai na kardi hoti to in ikhtilaf karne walon ke darmiyan faisla chuka diya jata, aur haqeeqat yeh hai ke yeh log uski taraf se sakht iztaraab angeiz (sakht bechain karne wale/disquieting) shakk mein paday huey hain
